Press

“Jennifer Hyman gave ‘Nightline’ a look inside RTR’s facility in Secaucus, New Jersey, where you’ll find the world’s largest dry cleaner and rack after rack of designer clothes.”

- NIGHTLINE


“Designers big and small who want to remain relevant—particularly
those who haven’t yet considered sustainability in their businesses—
would be wise to look into it now before they’re late to the party.”

- NIGHTLINE

Highlights


“Hyman’s been able to create something pretty rare: a majority-female company.
Women make up half of the board, 70 percent of employees, 62 percent of
corporate employees and an astonishing 75 percent of the executive team.
The company says that overall, 71 percent of employees are nonwhite.”

– HUFFPOST

Brand Values

Broadcast


“Zara and other fast fashion retailers, watch out.
Clearly, Rent the Runway is becoming a major disruptor in the industry.
(PS—if you haven’t tried their new Unlimited service, I 10/10 recommend).”

– COVETEUR

Podcasts

Awards


“Rent the Runway has been a go-to for all things fashion since its inception
in 2009. In case you’re unfamiliar, the company allows you to rent clothes
for an event and return it after you’ve worn it. Simple and makes sense!
Today, RTR Update is officially available, and let us tell you, it’s brilliant.”

– INSTYLE
